Room.Name: Mountain Stream
Room.ShortDescription: You see a narrow stream of crystal clear ice water running across the path.
Room.LongDescription: If you listen closely, it seems the stream murmurs in a language you can almost understand. The path twists and turns as it traverses the mountain, making it difficult to see very far in either direction. This might be a good place to rest. There is a shallow cave where the stream issues.
